CustomField.description: Method name to pass to ICursorBatchQueryBuilder.buildQuery(). Used by CursorJob for metadata-driven coordinator configuration. The query builder class uses this to route to the appropriate query method.
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Enter the method name for building the query (e.g., buildQueryForBillingFullDatabase). Required for CursorJob; leave blank for custom coordinator classes.
CustomField.label: Query Builder Method
